334 Arkansas, Tennessee and Utah are the first states to enact laws that require public schools to teach children as young as 5 the basics of gun safety and how to properly store guns in the home. (bearingarms.com) SAVE AMERICA posted 2 days ago by basedboston 21 comments award share report block Three States Now Require Gun Safety Training in Schools Three states now mandate gun safety training in schools for students of all ages. bearingarms.com
